title: Go! My Hero!
overview: Determined to impress her parents, Jiang Chuan Yu leaves home in search of business opportunities. For protection, she hires the world's best swordsman, Shi Tian Qing. The two later reunite, and along with Jiang Chuan Yu's fianc√©, they collaborate to carve out a profitable business. Can they succeed amidst all of the trials and tribulations they face? Will Jiang Chuan Yu wind up having to choose between the swordsman and the scholar?
